extension.dc:title: Simple Multimedia
extension.name: Multimedia
extension.dc:description: Simple extension for exchanging metadata about multimedia resources, in particular links to image, video and audio files.

property.name: type
property.dc:description: The kind of media object. Recommended terms from the DCMI Type Vocabulary are StillImage, Sound or MovingImage for GBIF to index and show the media files.

property.name: format
property.dc:description: The format the image is exposed in. It is recommended to use a IANA registered media type, but known file suffices are permissible too. See http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

property.name: identifier
property.dc:description: The public URL that identifies and locates the media file directly, not the html page it might be shown on. It is highly recommended that a URL to a media file of good resolution is provided or at least dc:reference in cases no public URI exists.

property.name: references
property.dc:description: An html webpage that shows the image or its metadata. This link should be used for html based image viewers like FSI and should be used as a source link wherever the media item is shown. It is recommended to provide this url even if a media file exists as it will be used for linking out.

property.name: title
property.dc:description: The media items title. Strongly recommended as in many cases this will be used as the hyperlink text, and should be used accrodingly.

property.name: description
property.dc:description: A textual description of the content of the media item
property.examples: Female Tachycineta albiventer photographed in the Amazon, Brazil, in November 2010.

property.name: created
property.dc:description: The date and time this media item was taken

property.name: creator
property.dc:description: The person that took the image, recorded the video or sound

property.name: contributor
property.dc:description: Any contributor in addition to the creator that helped in recording the media item

property.name: publisher
property.dc:description: An entity responsible for making the image available.

property.name: audience
property.dc:description: A class or description for whom the image is intended or useful

property.name: source
property.dc:description: If the media item was derived or taken from another source this is the reference to that resource. For example a book from which an image was scanned or the original provider of a photo/graphic, such as photography agencies.

property.name: license
property.dc:description: License for this media object. Can be text or a url like creative commons uses

property.name: rightsHolder
property.dc:description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the media item.
